changes.description: Initial public release of Dragon Traveler Wiki
Added responsive sidebar navigation and section-based route organization
Added global search modal with fuzzy search and keyboard shortcuts
Added artifacts database with detail pages
Added character database with portraits and skill information
Added howlkins database, filters, and golden alliance reference
Added noble phantasms database with detail pages
Added resources database with category and quality filtering
Added status effects database with icons and descriptions
Added tier list page with reference selection and builder tooling
Added teams list and team detail pages
Added redemption codes tracker with active/inactive status
Added useful links page for community tools and resources
Added guide pages: Beginner Q&A, Star Upgrade Calculator, Rotational Event Hoarding, and Shovel Event Guide
Added changelog page and structured release history data
Added dark/light theme toggle, shared page transitions, and loading/empty/error states
Added suggestion modals across core pages for community-driven data updates
